companies.name: A Digits Twins Teks
companies.details: Joined as a Senior Software Engineer with the role of Independent Contributor. Getting my hands dirty with Design Patterns, SOLID Principles, Agile Practices, Microservices, etc. in the projects here.

companies.name: Fujisakura Technologies
companies.details: Worked as an integral part of the team at Fujisakura as a Full Stack Developer. Got my hands on Laravel, CorePhP, Springboot, etc. Gave a lot of training to the team members and associate developers on my native tech stack.

companies.name: Lionforce Technologies
companies.details: I have Worked on enterprise level ERP systems developments with Laravel, Node.js, mysql and similar technologies. and managed the project with a great team of associate developers.

companies.name: KRDS
companies.details: My Full Stack Development journey started here. Worked on Laravel, Node.js, JQuery and similar technologies here with a great team to build some of the very interesting products with a very collaborative and great management.

companies.name: Deforay Technologies
companies.details: Started my career here as a Backend Developer mainly in PHP and Laravel. Learned a lot and grew with Deforay. Found some great collegues there. Great management and people to work with.
